ðŸ“– Summary: TxtNet Browser is an Android app that enables web browsing via SMS, eliminating the need for WiFi or mobile data. It achieves this by compressing HTML responses using Brotli and encoding them with a custom Base-114 format. The app also includes TxtNet Server, allowing users to host their own SMS-based web browsing service.
